original_text: Even if you become rich, that would not keep you safe. Even if you were strong and powerful, that would not keep trouble away from you. Even if you become rich,
korean_text: 그대의 부르짖음이나 그대의 능력이 어찌 능히 그대가 곤고한 가운데에서 그대를 유익하게 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: that would not keep you safe
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 너를 안전하게 지켜주지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: Even if you were strong and powerful
that would not keep trouble away from you
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 너에게서 환난을 멀리하지 못할 것이다
